mapper.sql: LLC_ID, TSC_ID, ZONE_ID, TOTAL_SHELVES, EMPTY_SHELVES, L_EMPTY_SHELVES, INITIAL_SHELVES, HWM_R_RATE, HWM_Y_RATE, HOST_SET_RATE, HOST_CLEAR_RATE, EMERGENCY_FLG, KEEP_EMPTY, ZONE_TYPE, ZONE_PRIORITY
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from STOCKER_ZONE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into STOCKER_ZONE (LLC_ID, TSC_ID, ZONE_ID, TOTAL_SHELVES, EMPTY_SHELVES, L_EMPTY_SHELVES, INITIAL_SHELVES, HWM_R_RATE, HWM_Y_RATE, HOST_SET_RATE, HOST_CLEAR_RATE, EMERGENCY_FLG, KEEP_EMPTY, ZONE_TYPE, ZONE_PRIORITY ) values (#{llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{emptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lEmptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{initialShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hwmRRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hwmYRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hostSetRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hostClearRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{emergencyFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keepEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zonePriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

insert into STOCKER_ZONE
LLC_ID,
TSC_ID,

mapper.update:
update STOCKER_ZONE
LLC_ID = #{record.llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_ID = #{record.tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONE_ID = #{record.zoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_SHELVES = #{record.totalShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPTY_SHELVES = #{record.emptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
L_EMPTY_SHELVES = #{record.lEmptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INITIAL_SHELVES = #{record.initialShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HWM_R_RATE = #{record.hwmRRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HWM_Y_RATE = #{record.hwmYRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOST_SET_RATE = #{record.hostSetRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOST_CLEAR_RATE = #{record.hostClearRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMERGENCY_FLG = #{record.emergencyFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEEP_EMPTY = #{record.keepEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZONE_TYPE = #{record.zoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONE_PRIORITY = #{record.zonePriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update STOCKER_ZONE set LLC_ID = #{record.llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_ID = #{record.tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE_ID = #{record.zoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_SHELVES = #{record.totalShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMPTY_SHELVES = #{record.emptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, L_EMPTY_SHELVES = #{record.lEmptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INITIAL_SHELVES = #{record.initialShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HWM_R_RATE = #{record.hwmRRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HWM_Y_RATE = #{record.hwmYRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOST_SET_RATE = #{record.hostSetRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOST_CLEAR_RATE = #{record.hostClearRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMERGENCY_FLG = #{record.emergencyFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEEP_EMPTY = #{record.keepEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZONE_TYPE = #{record.zoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE_PRIORITY = #{record.zonePriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update STOCKER_ZONE
TOTAL_SHELVES = #{totalShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPTY_SHELVES = #{emptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
L_EMPTY_SHELVES = #{lEmptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INITIAL_SHELVES = #{initialShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HWM_R_RATE = #{hwmRRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HWM_Y_RATE = #{hwmYRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOST_SET_RATE = #{hostSetRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOST_CLEAR_RATE = #{hostClearRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMERGENCY_FLG = #{emergencyFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEEP_EMPTY = #{keepEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZONE_TYPE = #{zoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONE_PRIORITY = #{zonePriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where LLC_ID = #{llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TSC_ID = #{tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZONE_ID = #{zoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update STOCKER_ZONE set TOTAL_SHELVES = #{totalShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMPTY_SHELVES = #{emptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, L_EMPTY_SHELVES = #{lEmptyShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INITIAL_SHELVES = #{initialShelves,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HWM_R_RATE = #{hwmRRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HWM_Y_RATE = #{hwmYRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOST_SET_RATE = #{hostSetRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOST_CLEAR_RATE = #{hostClearRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMERGENCY_FLG = #{emergencyFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEEP_EMPTY = #{keepEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZONE_TYPE = #{zoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE_PRIORITY = #{zonePriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where LLC_ID = #{llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TSC_ID = #{tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZONE_ID = #{zoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT stocker_zone.llc_id, stocker_zone.tsc_id, stocker_zone.zone_id, stocker_zone.total_shelves, stocker_zone.empty_shelves, stocker_zone.l_empty_shelves, stocker_zone.initial_shelves, stocker_zone.hwm_r_rate, stocker_zone.hwm_y_rate FROM stocker_zone ORDER BY stocker_zone.llc_id,stocker_zone.tsc_id,stocker_zone.zone_id
